thread.title: Ford to invest $1.8 bln to expand R&D in China -CEO
thread.title_full: Ford to invest $1.8 bln to expand R&D in China -CEO | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Ford to invest $1.8 bln to expand R&D in China -CEO
text:
SHANGHAI Oct 12 Ford Motor Co will invest 11.4 billion yuan ($1.8 billion) to expand research and development in China, Chief Executive Mark Fields said on Monday.
Fields, speaking at a corporate event in Shanghai, did not offer a time frame or further details on how the money would be spent. ($1 = 6.3303 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Adam Jourdan; Writing by Jake Spring; Editing by Kazunori Takada)
